resources.string: Hi, I am Lukas from Yogyakarta. I am 25 years old this year, and I really want to learn Android dev. Last year I supposed to get Android Developer free course at one of Programming Course in Yogyakarta, but its canceled because some reason. I hope by following class from Dicoding I can master Android Developer.
Champion International Roaster Champion International Roaster
GK 5 1053B, Jl. Sagan Tim., Terban, Kec. Gondokusuman, Kota Yogyakarta, Daerah Istimewa Yogyakarta 55223
